version_description:
GroupMe 团队诚邀你体验此更新

* 其他 Bug 修复

我们还是一如既往地希望听听你们的想法，所以请评论下吧! 有关详细信息，请访问我们的支持页面: http://groupme.com/help

The GroupMe team invites you to enjoy this update

* Fixed bugs preventing users from completing registration
* Misc bug fixes

As always, we love hearing what you think, so please consider leaving a review! For more information, please vis

The GroupMe team invites you to enjoy this update

* You can now send us feedback through the app, tap the menu button to get started
* Fixed GIF avatar not uploading during registration
* Fixed file attachments sent from other platforms not s

The GroupMe team invites you to enjoy this update

* You can now clone members of a group into a new group
* We've made it even easier to add friends on GroupMe! Just open the menu from the home screen to access your personal QR code
